content.rendered:
About OSI

We are committed to solving our clients’ business needs cost-effectively, using innovative processes and new technologies.

Mission

To drive innovation by delivering cutting-edge technology solutions that enhance operational efficiency and security.

Who We Are

Optimal Solutions Inc. (OSIGOV) is a certified small, disadvantaged business that provides a full range of technology services and emerging capabilities to the U.S Government, excelling in Agile Software Development, Satellite Communications (SATCOM) Engineering, Cybersecurity and Operations, Cloud/Modernization Strategies. We bring extensive expertise in Agile Project Management, Software Engineering using DevSecOps and SAFe, Cloud Engineering, Microservices Architecture, Cybersecurity, and containerized application management both on-premises and in the Cloud.

INSPIRED to INNOVATE

With our customers, we are partners in transformation. We manage and lead our times with transparency and collaboration as trusted innovation agents.

We focus on our customers’ objectives. We are solely focused on owning our customers’ goals, challenges, and plans.

And we empower our team members to think, build, and deliver. We hire for creativity and character, and we provide resources for our employees to grow professionally.

Optimal Solutions Inc. (OSI) provides trusted Information Technology services and solutions and mission-critical on-site services to the Federal Government. Established in 2009 and headquartered in Herndon, Virginia, OSI is an Asian Indian American owned Small Disadvantaged Business Enterprise (DBE).

Why OSI?

Proven Experience in Mission-Critical Support: We have a proven track record of driving technical innovation and efficiency into complex projects for defense, civilian, and intelligence agencies.

Diverse Technical Expertise: Our team consists of highly skilled professionals with expertise in software engineering, cybersecurity, cloud computing, and satellite communications.

Commitment to Innovation: We continuously invest in research and development to stay ahead of emerging technologies and industry best practices.

Customer-Centric Approach: We prioritize and focus on delivering business value to our customers incrementally to enable better Return of Investment (ROI).

Strong Partnerships: We collaborate with leading technology providers, including AWS, Microsoft, Google Cloud, and many other technology partners to offer the best solutions.
